test_type: Frontend E2E Testing - Odoo Integration Hub Field Mapping Redesign
summary: All requested features verified working. The new table-based Field Mapping UI is fully functional with entity cards, toggle switches, Add Field modal, Save functionality, and Sync Data tab.

login_flow.details: Login with superadmin@salescommand.com / demo123 successful, redirects to dashboard

connection_tab.details: Connected to Odoo v19.0+e, shows 'Connection Successful!' message with green status indicator

entity_cards.details: Three entity cards visible: Contacts & Companies (12 fields), Opportunities (11 fields), Activities (8 fields). All show 'Active' status.

entity_selection.details: Clicking entity cards shows corresponding field mappings table. Selected card shows purple border and checkmark.

field_mappings_table.details: Table displays with correct columns: Enable, Odoo Field, Local Field, Type, Transform, Flags, Actions

toggle_switches.details: Toggle switches work correctly. Clicking toggles enable/disable state (green=enabled, gray=disabled). Field count updates accordingly.

ai_auto_map_button.details: AI Auto-Map button visible with sparkle icon in purple gradient style

add_field_button.details: Add Field button opens modal with form fields: Odoo Field Name, Odoo Field Type, Local Field Name, Local Field Type, Transform, Required checkbox, Key Field checkbox

save_button.details: Save button saves mappings and shows 'Field mappings saved!' toast notification

flags_column.details: Flags column shows REQ (required) and KEY indicators correctly

sync_data_tab.details: Shows Full Synchronization section with 'Sync All Now' button. Three entity sync cards with Preview and Sync Now buttons. Last sync timestamps displayed.

history_tab.details: History tab visible but not tested per instructions

critical_code_review_comments: OdooIntegrationHub.js redesign is clean and well-structured with SimpleFieldMappingTab component
Table-based UI is much more user-friendly than previous three-panel layout
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Toggle switches have proper visual feedback (green/gray states)
Add Field modal has comprehensive form with all necessary fields
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Odoo connection and synced data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Field Mapping UI redesign complete and working. Table-based interface with entity cards at top, field mappings table below. All CRUD operations (toggle, add, save) functional. Odoo connected to securadotest.odoo.com v19.0+e. Route is /integrations/odoo.
